REFERRED TO NEW YORK CITY EDUCATION

Title: Allows for an alternated holiday for pupils in all public schools in the borough of Brooklyn or in the borough of Queens
Summary: Allows the chancellor of the city district of the city of New York to require pupils in public schools in the borough of Brooklyn or in the borough of Queens to attend school on anniversary day, but to declare a holiday for such pupils on an alternate date in the same school year to allow for the celebration of a significant cultural or religious holiday.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to allowing for an alternated holiday for pupils in all public schools in the borough of Brooklyn or in the borough of Queens
